text: Fazio's family was strong and growing
when evil came calling almost five years
ago the Islamic state group arrived at
their doorstep in Iraq and broke the
family apart
as they tried to become whole again
Germany gave some of them refuge fazio
was taken by is with her four children
only her husband escaped the day that is
took Iraq Sinjar is laid waste to Sinjar
but their darkest acts were kept for the
Yazidis a religious minority they viewed
as infidels raped and enslaved the UN
called it a genocide not far from here
the men were taken away and killed the
woman and children thought they would be
next fall Zia endured it all our kids
were crying
each our eyes would come and take the
young woman and the children from their
mothers we were forced to live in
disgrace and humiliation the treaty
doesn't look cheap they told me a man
has bought you I said I'd rather be
killed than go with that man
Fazio was bought and sold six times in
Syria two of her oldest children were
taken from her after a year of hell
freedom here in the pink she's
surrounded by her family at the Iraqi
border a deal was done
$20,000 ransom for her and two of her
children but it was a bittersweet moment
her eldest son Masha and daughter Jolene
were still trapped in Syria with is how
does that sound Shawn he asked me to
take off the black dress of is I still
couldn't believe it I thought it was
another of their tricks I said to myself
I've already lost two of my kids but at
least getting the two youngest boys out
is a good thing
in March this year nine-year-old Jolene
was found safely now in Iraq she tries
to forget about the last five years of
work cruelty and forced prayer
she speaks rarely though again a ransom
was paid if she'd have been a few years
older is would have forced her to marry
a fighter but where was eleven-year-old
Nash at he was still missing still in
the Islamic state groups grip he was
here in the nightmare of bagus where is
made the last stand of its doomed
caliphate is stole his family and his
childhood they forced him to convert to
Islam but incredibly he made it out
alive we found him in Syria they would
buy us children no matter what the age
and make us servants and buy a woman of
any age and make them wives they treated
their children nicely like a piece of
gold but they kicked us out at night to
sleep in the garden or the sheepfold I
don't know why they would buyers if they
didn't want to look after us
when the end came it was a horror that
your child should enjoy I have never
been inside mothers but I've stood
outside that when the fighting was going
on it looks really scary can you tell me
what it was like y-yeah but see my
mother bombing there was only one day
without bombing a vehicle full of arms
exploded and other vehicles full of
weapons exploded at least 200 the cars
and tents were full of weapons that
night
everywhere was red in the morning
everything was burned houses and tents
melted and glass and I on to now shot is
free but still lost who dreams of being
reunited with his parents in Germany
he's missed them for nearly half his
life and today his mum is coming to get
him Vasya is travelling in the hope of
bringing nashit and Julian back to
Germany to be with the rest of the
family thousands of miles away in Iraq
dressed in their best they set it's been
a long wait so long in fact they have
two brothers they've never met
so much stood in the way of this embrace
together at last they are a family that
refused to be beaten by terror and hate
under the same roof again for the first
time in years they can finally sleep
without fear we all know the Islamic
state group strains on the battlefield
but this is where it's really filmed
they tried to destroy this family
they tried to wipe out the entire Yazidi
people but they didn't they failed
Romick state groups on the run now but
the pain and the suffering that they've
caused has been amplified tens of
thousands of families here in Iraq and
in Syria too and that's going to take
generations to recover from countless
other Yazidi families will never be
reunited
this is a family that their country and
the West field to protect
despite this the endured and that is
another victory against the Islamic
state group
Quentin Somerville BBC News northern
Iraq
